Package org.apache.fop.afp.ptoca

Contains a collection of classes for working with Presentation Text Objects (PTOCA).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PtocaConstants A collection of PTOCA constants.
PtocaProducer Producer interface that is passed to a PresentationTextObject to produce PTOCA control sequences using a PtocaBuilder.
 

Class Summary
LineDataInfoProducer PtocaProducer implementation that interprets AFPLineDataInfo objects.
PtocaBuilder Generator class for PTOCA data structures.
TextDataInfoProducer PtocaProducer implementation that interprets AFPTextDataInfo objects.
 

Package org.apache.fop.afp.ptoca Description

Contains a collection of classes for working with Presentation Text Objects (PTOCA).
